reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater super soft and comfortable, with one noting it doesn't require fabric softener. They appreciate its quality, beautiful appearance, and color that stays true after washing. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others note issues with the neckline, and several customers mention it sheds a lot. Customers consider it not worth the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little bit of luxury
items.body: BarefootDreams cozy chic ultra lite, the lightest of all the BD fabrications. Washes well, retains its shape and the color saturation stays true after multiple washings. Fabric softener not needed, if BD recommends not to use as the fibers will get coated and the softness is actually negatively impacted with its use. Read more
items.author: Pink Power

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I could live in these
items.body: I love these pajamas. I am 5'2" 108 lbs petite and the XS fit great. I also got the pants for the set. The color is exactly how it looks and the pullover is so nice you can wear it with a pair of jeans and be fine for work. I love this company. The pajamas themselves are so so soft. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Axelson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars attractive and comfortable.
items.body: I bought several tops and bottoms to wear around the house. I find them attractive and comfortable. My only worry is that they will stop making them. Read more
items.author: elainelomas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: This sweater run very large. Not as expected because of the fit Read more
items.author: Frenchie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Five Stars — My Girlfriend Has Ascended Into Comfy Heaven
items.body: I got this Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Ultra Lite Slouchy Pullover as a gift for my girlfriend—her first Barefoot Dreams item—and let me tell you… I have never seen someone develop a personality based entirely on softness until now. She put it on, gasped, whispered “oh my God,” and then immediately informed me I will now be buying her the matching pants, robe, blanket, and possibly a full Barefoot Dreams lifestyle. Worth it? Absolutely. The material is so soft it should honestly be illegal. If clouds had clouds, those clouds would wear this sweater. ⸻ Pros & Cons (aka: The Truth Behind the Fluff) ✅ Pros: • Softer than a puppy wearing velvet who whispers compliments. • Instantly turns your girlfriend into a cozy, happy, non-grumpy human. • Makes you look like the world’s greatest gift giver (you’re welcome). • Lightweight, slouchy, and perfect for “I want to be comfy but still look cute” days. • Touching it feels like petting a dream. A barefoot one, apparently. ❌ Cons: • She may now judge every other piece of clothing she owns as “inferior peasant fabric.” • You will be buying more Barefoot Dreams—this is just the gateway sweater. • Might steal your hoodies less… but also might steal this from herself and never take it off. • You will be asked to “feel how soft it is” roughly 12 times a day. ⸻ If you’re considering getting it: do it. Just understand you are unlocking a new level of cozy addiction. And honestly? Totally worth it. Read more
items.author: Zach

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible quality and off-white yellow color
items.body: Not worth the money and it is not white. The color is an off-white, yellow color, terrible quality. Read more
items.author: carlene m benelli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing info
items.body: I had trouble finding a “good” review that actually gave me some idea of fitting. So here it goes ... I am 6’0. I weigh 145lbs. I fit into the size small with room. I do not want tight fitting lounge wear. It has a wider neck band so u can slightly see your sports bra straps on both sides. It is long enough on my arms to where my wrist meets the stop of my hand. When I left my arms above my head my mid- drift shoes about 2inches. Of course extremely cozy soft. I purchased other BFD pieces from a boutique in town and she said do not was after every use and when u do, cold and lay flat to dry. Hope this helps. Read more
items.author: JA

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive, Pearl, Sand Dune, Dove Gray, Carbon, Stone. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
